baseRule.text: 若比丘。憍奢耶雜純黑羺羊毛作新敷具。尼薩耆波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 13

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu kosiyamissakaṁ santhataṁ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer sich eine mit Seide vermischte Filz (-decke/ -matte) anfertigen läßt, muß sie aushändigen und dafür sühnen.
If a monk has a blanket made that contains silk, he commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
Si un bhikkhu encarga un manto que contiene seda: ha de ser renunciado y confesado.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。新憍奢耶作敷具。尼薩耆波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘新憍奢耶作敷具。尼薩耆波夜提
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻用新高世耶絲綿。作敷具者。泥薩祇波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。新憍賒耶作臥具。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 21

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！雜野蠶綿，作新臥具，尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

translations.text: If a monk make a new coverlet for himself out of mixed silk, it is Nissaggiya Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu membuat sehelai jubah baru dengan suatu campuran sutra mentah, ia melakukan sebuah naiḥsargika pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘雜野蠶綿作臥具者。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11

fullParallels.text: 若比丘雜憍奢耶作臥具。若使他作成者。尼薩耆波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Nissaggiya Pācittiya 11
